name: Keen Nose
description: This creature has ADV on Checks that rely on its sense of smell.

name: Pack Hunter
description: A number of times equal to this creature's Proficiency per day, it can give itself or an ally ADV on an attack if it is adjacent to them.

name: Protect the Pack
description: Once per Long Rest, if an Attack is going to hit an adjacent creature, this creature can swap places with them making itself the target of the attack instead.

name: Sharp Claws
description: When this creature makes an Unarmed Attack its base damage is 1 and the damage type can be Bludgeoning or Slashing.

name: Prowler
description: This creature has ADV on Stealth Checks.

name: Land on Its Feet
description: This creature takes 1 less damage from Falling and has ADV against effects and Saves that would make it fall Prone.

name: Flexible Skeleton
description: This creature suffers no Speed penalty for squeezing into a space that is only large enough for a creature that is one size smaller than it.

name: Prey Instinct
description: This creature has ADV on checks and saves against being Grappled and on Saves to avoid traps.

name: Keen Nose
description: This creature has ADV on Checks that rely on its sense of smell.

name: Hollow Bones
description: This creature takes 1 less damage from Falling, but it has DIS on saves or checks to avoid being forcibly moved.

name: Flight
description: If this creature's arms/wings are not constrained or holding an object and it is not wearing Heavy Armor, it has a Flight speed equal to half of its normal Speed. While flying it can hold objects in its talons.

name: Keen Eyes
description: This creature has ADV on checks that require sight.
